description: This file defines API route handlers for managing healthcare schedules, including endpoints for creating or updating, retrieving, listing, and deleting schedules for doctors. It makes use of express.js routing, authentication, authorization middleware, and references a schedulesController for business logic.

methods.name: HTTP PUT /
methods.description: Handles creating or updating a schedule, ensuring the doctor can only modify their own schedule unless authenticated as an admin.

methods.name: HTTP GET /:doctorId/:date
methods.description: Retrieves a specific doctor's schedule for a given date.

methods.name: HTTP GET /:doctorId
methods.description: Lists all schedules for a specific doctor within a specified range.

methods.name: HTTP DELETE /:doctorId/:date
methods.description: Deletes a schedule for a specific doctor on a given date, with checks to ensure doctors can only delete their own schedules.
